t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: In some situations, an advertiser may need to leverage the “Amazon” logo either alone (third-party usage) or in a lockup with their own logo (co-branding). Any use of the Amazon logo must be approved and reviewed in all cases. Please send request for approval with examples of proposed usage ...
